channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 在唐纳德-特朗普暗示澳大利亚驻华盛顿大使 "不是最聪明的灯泡 "并可能被驱逐出美国之后，澳大利亚坚称其大使工作出色。
item.description:
Australia insisted that its ambassador to Washington was doing a good job after Donald Trump suggested he was "not the brightest bulb" and could be expelled from the United States.https://t.co/yzouLKeJx5 pic.twitter.com/Jp1pr6KGV8

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州一名男子因绑架、强奸和谋杀其前女友而被定罪，他将被处以死刑，这是美国南部州四年多来首次执行死刑。
item.description:
A Georgia man convicted of kidnapping, raping and murdering his former girlfriend is set to be put to death in the southern US state's first execution in more than four years.https://t.co/oY8GikzlbO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的政府宣布了修订后的汽车和卡车污染标准，旨在加快美国汽车行业向电动化转型，以减缓气候变化。
item.description:
President Joe Biden's administration announced revised pollution standards for cars and trucks meant to accelerate the US auto industry's shift to electric to mitigate climate change.https://t.co/hjJnOYsTD4 pic.twitter.com/7F7s4kwUYq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #美联储决议公布后，道琼斯指数、标普500指数和纳斯达克指数创下收盘纪录
item.description:
#BREAKING Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq end at records after US Fed decision pic.twitter.com/MJa5yKtsbE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 拉迪亚斯-孔杰（Ladias Konje）家位于津巴布韦东北部的玉米地每年这个时候通常都是绿油油的，但现在已经枯黄一片。
item.description:
Ladias Konje's maize field in northeastern Zimbabwe is normally green at this time of the year, but it is already parched yellow.https://t.co/xe3HO9YItf pic.twitter.com/Jmx7AnT7xx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 周三，海地官员表示，在激烈的帮派暴力使国家陷入混乱的背景下，组建一个过渡委员会来管理海地的谈判取得了进展。
item.description:
Negotiations to form a transitional council to govern Haiti advanced on Wednesday, officials said, against a backdrop of intense gang violence that has plunged the country into chaos.https://t.co/QNwrIJOmQT pic.twitter.com/gjQxmwpb1G

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #美国联邦储备委员会维持关键贷款利率不变
item.description:
#BREAKING US Federal Reserve leaves key lending rate unchanged pic.twitter.com/TMDwDwdxAo

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 波兰农民在全国范围内封锁道路，抗议从欧盟以外（尤其是乌克兰）进口农产品，以及他们认为增加了成本的环境法规。
item.description:
Polish farmers blocked roads nationwide in a new protest against farm imports from outside the European Union, in particular Ukraine, and environmental regulations that they say increases costs.https://t.co/NlUpRWD34D pic.twitter.com/sHOV3duS0u

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 18 岁的谢基巴（Shekiba）被困在阿富汗一个偏远小镇的家中，她经常在屋子里四处寻找零星的网络信号，这是她接受教育的最后一条途径。
item.description:
Sequestered at home in a remote Afghan town, 18-year-old Shekiba often roams the house hunting for the patchy internet signal that is her last link to an education.https://t.co/c5tFYe5d0G pic.twitter.com/VJ8w303ZTS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 当 Herve 在 40 岁时发现自己患有胶质母细胞瘤--一种最具侵袭性的脑癌--时，他与自己做了一个约定。
item.description:
When Herve found out he had glioblastoma -- the most aggressive form of brain cancer -- at the age of 40, he made a deal with himself.https://t.co/d39WyJO344 pic.twitter.com/iNQpn49M13

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #黑山法院下令将加密货币大亨引渡到韩国。
item.description:
#BREAKING Montenegro court orders cryptocurrency tycoon's extradition to South Korea. pic.twitter.com/S5RU5hbnHl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国参议院三分之一以上的民主党议员呼吁乔-拜登总统的政府采取 "大胆 "行动建立巴勒斯坦国，这是对以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡的最新回击。
item.description:
More than a third of the US Senate's Democrats called on President Joe Biden's administration to take "bold" action toward establishing a Palestinian state, in the latest pushback against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.https://t.co/LHfuosnbM0 pic.twitter.com/TNPqYMvLsp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯周三抵达沙特阿拉伯，支持国际社会努力确保以色列-哈马斯战争停战，因为被围困的加沙地带正面临饥荒威胁 ⬇️
item.description:
US Secretary of State Antony Blinken touched down in Saudi Arabia on Wednesday to bolster international efforts to secure a truce in the Israel-Hamas war, as the threat of famine looms in besieged Gaza ⬇️ https://t.co/Ven9nu7gNJ pic.twitter.com/ad1DPGzm28

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托赢得总统职位：选举委员会
item.description:
#BREAKING Indonesia's Prabowo Subianto wins presidency: elections commission pic.twitter.com/PTQfNPHqV9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇬🇲 冈比亚议员推进解除切割女性生殖器官禁令的法案立法者投票决定将一项极具争议的法案推进到下一个议会阶段，该法案旨在解除自2015年起实施的切割女性生殖器官禁令。#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇬🇲 Gambian MPs advance bill lifting ban on female genital mutilation

Lawmakers have voted to advance to the next parliamentary stage a highly controversial bill that seeks to lift a ban on female genital mutilation, which has been in place since 2015.#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/067fqbPu0b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #越南--干旱导致盐碱化，农民为淡水而挣扎 📸@nhacnguyen8 #AFP
item.description:
#Vietnam - Farmers struggle for fresh water as drought brings salinisation.📸@nhacnguyen8 #AFP pic.twitter.com/JgWdRJKdNu

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 20, 2024

item.title: 大谷翔平周三在首尔举行的美国职业棒球大联盟赛季揭幕战中以 5-2 大胜圣迭戈教士队，为他的洛杉矶道奇队生涯开了个好头。
item.description:
Shohei Ohtani got his Los Angeles Dodgers career off to a winning start Wednesday in a 5-2 victory over the San Diego Padres in their Major League Baseball season-opening clash in Seoul.#AFPSports
https://t.co/hwJsdiEArD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 周三，俄罗斯对国际奥委会发起了猛烈抨击，认为国际奥委会对俄罗斯运动员的限制以及对莫斯科举办的友谊赛的批评等同于 "新纳粹主义"。
item.description:
Russia launched a furious tirade at the International Olympic Committee on Wednesday, arguing the IOC's restrictions on Russian athletes and its criticism of the Moscow-organised Friendship Games amounted to "neo-Nazism".#AFPSports https://t.co/4XZVHPOd8q

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 英国公共支出监督机构周三表示，英国政府利用前军事基地和一艘驳船收容寻求庇护者的做法备受争议，其成本将高于继续使用酒店。
item.description:
The UK government's controversial use of former military bases and a barge to house asylum seekers is set to cost more than continuing to use hotels, a public spending watchdog said Wednesday.https://t.co/BqHoWhK3pP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #南非银行称法院下令部分冻结前总统祖马的账户
item.description:
#BREAKING South Africa bank says ordered by court to partially freeze ex-president Zuma's accounts pic.twitter.com/Y4loeu07ed

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #警方因涉嫌腐败搜查西班牙足协办公室：司法消息来源
item.description:
#BREAKING Police search Spanish football federation offices over alleged corruption: judicial sources pic.twitter.com/i1TgzCZ7FP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡宣布辞职
item.description:
#BREAKING Irish PM Leo Varadkar announces resignation pic.twitter.com/QzBD1Ha9Y9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：马拉加毕加索博物馆举办新展览 "巴勃罗-毕加索：发明的结构。作品的统一性"。该展览结合了绘画、素描、雕塑和陶瓷作品，计划展出三年。
item.description:
VIDEO: Picasso Museum of Malaga presents its new exhibition 'Pablo Picasso: Structures of Invention. The Unity of a Work'. Combining paintings, drawings, sculptures and ceramics, the exhibition is scheduled to run for three years. pic.twitter.com/aydlSxknGH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：在印度南部小镇 Somwarpet，当地人庆祝被称为 "Thyyam "或 "Kaliyattam "的传统舞蹈节。这种仪式结合了戏剧、哑剧和崇拜，是南印度最古老、最著名的仪式之一。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the southern Indian town of Somwarpet, locals celebrate the traditional dance festival known as 'Theyyam' or 'Kaliyattam.' The ritual combining theatre, mime and worship is one of South India's oldest and most prominent rituals. pic.twitter.com/4UVeNM4krT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：被毁坏的阿尼城矗立在世界上最敏感的边界之一，一座摇摇欲坠的桥梁象征着土耳其和亚美尼亚之间的关系状况。阿尼曾是中世纪亚美尼亚王国的首都，历史学家希望修复这座城市可以修复两国关系。
item.description:
VIDEO: The ruined city of Ani stands on one of the world's most sensitive borders, a crumbling bridge symbolising the state of relations between Turkey and Armenia. Once the capital of a mediaeval Armenian kingdom, historians hope that restoring it could repair ties. pic.twitter.com/zeV4d6v6Gh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 尽管中国经济近期略有好转，监管机构对科技行业也采取了更为宽松的态度，但中国互联网巨头腾讯公司的年度利润仍创下了2019年以来的最低水平。
item.description:
Chinese internet giant Tencent has posted its lowest annual profit since 2019, despite slight improvements recently in China's economy and a more lenient attitude taken by regulators towards the tech sector.https://t.co/3IQiTXFWkj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：鲨鱼咬人事件总体上极为罕见，科学家希望更多人了解这一事实，尤其是在鲨鱼数量不断减少、亟待保护的情况下。
item.description:
VIDEO: Shark bites are exceedingly rare overall, a fact scientists wish more people knew, especially amid declining shark populations desperately in need of conservation. pic.twitter.com/aWMKFB6Qjf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 视频：智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步时收集塑料垃圾。蒋正在努力推广 "plogging"（慢跑时捡拾垃圾）的做法。
item.description:
VIDEO: Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam collect plastic waste as they walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in Santiago. Chiang is on a quest to promote the practice of "plogging" -- picking up litter while jogging. pic.twitter.com/Mxi9Z02khi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 欧盟成员国和立法者已达成协议，对部分乌克兰谷物的免税进口设置上限。
item.description:
EU member states and lawmakers have reached a deal to cap duty-free imports of some Ukrainian grains, which were allowed in the wake of Russia's invasion but have drawn fierce protests from farmers in the bloc.https://t.co/kQ4ycu2uMs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 20, 2024

item.title: #France - Vendee globe：公海前的高山.📸@jeffpachoud #AFP
item.description:
#France - Vendee globe: The hight mountain before the open sea.
